pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 14, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Stoney Creek, Ontario

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception with the Croatian-Canadian community in honour of the visit of the President of Croatia, Kolinda Grabar-KitaroviÄ‡, and will deliver brief remarks.

Croatian Sports and Community Centre of Hamilton
166 Green Mountain Road East

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.

Ottawa, Ontario 

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Paris, France.

Canada Reception Centre
190 Clear Skies Private

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for departure
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 p.m.
